REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to developing statewide standards for color coding all conduits used, operated or owned by public service corporations
Summary: Relates to developing statewide standards for color coding all conduits used, operated or owned by public service corporations.
LawCode: Amd ยง5, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to developing statewide standards for color coding all conduits used, operated or owned by public service corporations for identification purposes
